definition: handle or shaft (of an axe etc)/hoe/to harrow
Pei Pa Koa, proprietary cough syrup made with traditional Chinese herbs

sentences.english: The color-protecting techniques in Loquat fruit wine processing were studied.
sentences.chinese: 對枇杷果酒加工過程中的護色工藝進行了研究。

sentences.english: But we both took one true heart and two box of loquats.
sentences.chinese: 但我們還是帶上一顆真心，兩箱枇杷。

sentences.english: The loquat in the yard has got ripe gradually.
sentences.chinese: 院子裏的枇杷漸次熟了。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION The leases of Eriobotrya japonica(Thumb. )Lindl. are valuable for intensive research and development.
sentences.chinese: 結論枇杷葉具有深入研發的重要價值。

sentences.english: Fruit thinning is necessary in the producing of seedless loquat.
sentences.chinese: 生產無核枇杷必須進行疏果。

sentences.english: Loquat (Eriobotrya japonica Lindl. ) originated from China is a well-known, characteristic tree species.
sentences.chinese: 枇杷是原產於我國的名優特色樹種。

sentences.english: Why not Zhai loquat tree to tree Quzhai have to do?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼不在樹下摘枇杷而要到樹上去摘呢？

sentences.english: The leaf number in fruit branch was closely related to fruit size and quality.
sentences.chinese: 枇杷果穗上葉數與果實大小及品質有密切關係。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of different preparing methods on the quality of Follum Eriobotryae.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解不同炮製方法的枇杷葉炮製品質量。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE Summarize the research progress on the leaves of Eriobotrya japonica(Thumb).
sentences.chinese: 目的介紹枇杷葉的研究概況和研究方法。

sentences.english: The brown pigment of loquat nut is natural and pigment.
sentences.chinese: 枇杷果核棕色素是一種天然色素。

sentences.english: In this paper the nutrition composition of the Eriobotrya Japonia nut was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 對枇杷核仁的營養成分進行了分析。

sentences.english: Now I got problem picking loquats.
Loquat has a lot of nutrition and can become medicine.
sentences.chinese: 枇杷有很多營養，且可以做成藥。

sentences.english: In the world, my favorite fruit is loquat.
sentences.chinese: 在這個世界上，我最愛的水果就是枇杷了。

sentences.english: Loquat trees stay green in the winter and produce an apricot-like fruit.
sentences.chinese: 枇杷留在冬季樹木綠化和產生杏類水果。
